function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of the novel coronavirus","Impact":"Severely impacted the financial system","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health measures, vaccination, and testing","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Dynamic evolution of the pandemic","Impact":"Resulted in possible drift of investment styles","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of market conditions, diversification of investment portfolios, and seeking expert financial advice","Technologies":"AI-powered investment analysis tools, algorithmic trading platforms, and risk management software","People":"Investors, fund managers, and financial analysts","Owner":"Financial institutions, investment firms, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Transition from riskier to relatively safer options in investment strategies","Impact":"Change in investment patterns and potential impact on market stability","Mitigation":"Risk assessment and scenario planning, diversification of investment portfolio, and adherence to regulatory guidelines","Technologies":"Risk management software, financial modeling tools, and market analysis platforms","People":"Investors, fund managers, and financial regulators","Owner":"Investment firms, regulatory bodies, and financial institutions"}]}
